mutants.original_line: clean_word = ''.join(e for e in word if e.isalnum())
mutants.mutated_line: clean_word = 'MUTATED'.join((e for e in word if e.isalnum()))

mutants.original_line: punct = ''.join(e for e in word if e in punctuation)
mutants.mutated_line: punct = 'MUTATED'.join((e for e in word if e in punctuation))

mutants.original_line: punct = ''.join(e for e in word if e in punctuation)
mutants.mutated_line: punct = ''.join((e for e in word if e not in punctuation))
